snippet: A federal mediator met separately with officials from the N.B.A. and its players union in hopes of bringing an end to the league’s four-month long lockout.
lead_paragraph: A federal mediator met separately with officials from the N.B.A. and its players union in hopes of bringing an end to the league’s four-month long lockout.

headline.main: N.B.A. and Union Meet With Mediator
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. and Union Meet With Mediator
